description:
Before you can become a User Experience (UX) designer, you need to understand
the importance of UX, the reason it exists, what the goal of the UX designer
is and how they think.In this course, youâ€™ll learn all about UX Design, what
it is, what UX designers do, how UX designers think, what tools UX designers
use, and how to move forward in the field of UX.
title: UX Basics
